events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and the product description was misleading.
The customer's inquiry has been identified as a refund request related to a sizing issue and dissatisfaction with the product description.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative Jane Smith for handling the refund request.
Hello, thank you for contacting us regarding your recent purchase. I understand you would like to request a refund for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the product has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new and unused; I just found it did not fit and the size details were confusing.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back to our returns address and once received, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for your prompt help. I will send it back today and appreciate the quick refund process.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 2-3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been completed and no further issues have been reported. Thank you for shopping with us.
